tag: algorithm

---

## 2070. 큰 놈, 작은 놈, 같은 놈

```
import java.util.Scanner;
public class Solution {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner stdIn = new Scanner(System.in);
		int N = stdIn.nextInt();
		int number = 1;
		for (int i = 0; i < N ; i ++ ) {
			int A = stdIn.nextInt();
			int B = stdIn.nextInt();
			
			int C = A-B;
			if(C > 0 ) {
				System.out.println("#" + number +" >");number++;
			}
			else if(C < 0) {
				System.out.println("#" + number +" <");number++;
			}
			else {
				System.out.println("#" + number +" =");number++;	
			}
		}	
	}

}

```




- - -

참고자료
